TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AxisArrowStyle extends System.Enum

remarks.format: ## Remarks The AxisArrowStyle enumeration represents the style for an axis arrow. If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ArrowStyle%2A> property is set to None, no arrow is displayed for an axis.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisArrowStyle Lines = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A line-shaped arrow is used for the relevant axis.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisArrowStyle None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No arrow is used for the relevant axis.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisArrowStyle SharpTriangle = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A sharp triangular arrow is used for the relevant axis.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisArrowStyle Triangle = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A triangular arrow is used for the relevant axis.
